original_text: You must live as my special people. So do not eat any meat from your animals that wild animals have killed. Instead, you must give it as food to the dogs.
korean_text: 너희는 내게 거룩한 사람이 될지니 들에서 짐승에게 찢긴 동물의 고기를 먹지 말고 그것을 개에게 던질지니라

sentences.original_text: You must live as my special people.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나의 특별한 백성으로 살아야 한다.

sentences.original_text: So do not eat any meat
from your animals that wild animals have killed.
Instead, you must give it as food
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에 너는 그것을 음식으로 주어야 한다
